title: Can't post comments
body: Must be level 7 or higher, but I've been max level for a long time so ...?

replies.body:
If your in-game level and your Boards level aren't matching up, try using our Boards Profile Syncing Tool:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/6JI91pva-boards-profile-syncing-tool

It should automatically queue up your Boards account for a sync, hopefully adjusting your level within 15 minutes. If you have any issues with the tool, don't hesitate to reach out!
Sometimes you just need to make a quick post here in order to make your boards and summoner accounts sync up with each other. Looks like this did the trick!
Since it's your first time in the forum, it synced up with your current information when you posted. You're now showing as level 30, so you should be able to post comments now.
